item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 23, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Agent.exe, a cross-platform app to let 3.5 Sonnet control your machine (179 points | 117 comments)
2. OpenObserve: Observability platform for logs, metrics, traces, analytics (24 points | 4 comments)
3. Show HN: A macOS Client for HuggingFace Chat (32 points | 2 comments)

8. Parks on the Air (18 points | 3 comments)
